mapper.select: SELECT TO_CHAR(end_date, 'YYYY-MM') AS month, (SUM(CASE WHEN completed = 1 THEN 5 ELSE 0 END) + (SELECT COUNT(*) * 5 FROM diary WHERE TO_CHAR(written_at, 'YYYY-MM') = TO_CHAR(end_date, 'YYYY-MM') AND user_id = #{userId})) AS points FROM todo_list WHERE user_id = #{userId} GROUP BY TO_CHAR(end_date, 'YYYY-MM') ORDER BY month

SELECT TO_CHAR(end_date, 'YYYY-MM') AS month, COUNT(*) AS total_tasks, SUM(CASE WHEN completed = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS completed_tasks, ROUND(SUM(CASE WHEN completed = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) / COUNT(*) * 100, 2) AS completion_rate FROM todo_list WHERE user_id = #{userId} GROUP BY TO_CHAR(end_date, 'YYYY-MM') ORDER BY month

SELECT category, COUNT(*) AS task_count FROM todo_list WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND created_date >= TO_DATE(#{startDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND created_date <= TO_DATE(#{endDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') GROUP BY category ORDER BY task_count DESC

SELECT category, COUNT(*) AS completed_count FROM todo_list WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND completed = 1 AND end_date >= TO_DATE(#{startDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND end_date <= TO_DATE(#{endDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') GROUP BY category ORDER BY completed_count DESC
SELECT TO_CHAR(written_at, 'YYYY-MM') AS month, COUNT(*) AS diary_count FROM diary WHERE user_id = #{userId} GROUP BY TO_CHAR(written_at, 'YYYY-MM') ORDER BY month
